CodifyData.Content: Our tutors will adapt to your needs and help you achieve your goals
Schedule your classes according to your availability. We adapt to you
Our virtual classroom has everything you need. videoconferencing, white board...

SubjectInfoData.Title: Personalized private tutoring in all subjects

SubjectInfoCardData.Body: Biology, physics, chemistry, engineering and mathematics
SubjectInfoCardData.Content: Our tutoring in the science and math category is available in all grades, from grade 1 to university level. We even cover a range of courses at the university level. Contact us for more info regarding our math & science help

PricingData.Content: All tutoring is pay as you go. Prices depends on the subject, level, and tutor experience. Our one-time registration fee gives you unlimited access to our network of professional tutors.

CodifyPricingOffers.Title: Block Bookings
CodifyPricingOffers.Description: We offer discounts for block bookings. 5% off for 10hours and 10% off for 20 hours of tutoring paid upfront

CodifyPricingOffers.Title: Group Discounts
CodifyPricingOffers.Description: Pair up with friends and learn together for less. Each additional student will only need to pay 50% of the rate

CodifyPricingOffers.Title: Get a Free Hour
CodifyPricingOffers.Description: Get a free hour of tutoring when you refer a friend or family member to hire a tutor. there is no limit to how many you can recommend!

BecomeTutorCardsData.Title: Fast Payments
BecomeTutorCardsData.Description: Set your own rates by bidding on jobs. Get paid weekly

BecomeTutorCardsData.Title: Supportive Team
BecomeTutorCardsData.Description: 24/7 tech and administrative support. We are here when you need us

BecomeTutorCardsData.Title: The Best Tech
BecomeTutorCardsData.Description: Everything is automated in one simple and easy to use platform.
